mapper.sql: ID, T_SRV_PRICE_REGION_ID, T_SRV_PRICE_REGION_CODE, NAME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, ACTIVE, DESCRIPTION, VERSION_INFO, VERSION_NO, REF_ID, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_USER_CODE, MODIFY_USER_CODE, CREATE_ORG_CODE, MODIFY_ORG_CODE, CURRENCY_CODE, TRANSPORT_FLAG,CUSTOMER_NAME,CUSTOMER_CODE
mapper.insert: insert /*综合-价格-插入价格方案*/ into PKP.T_SRV_PRICE_PLAN (ID, T_SRV_PRICE_REGION_ID, T_SRV_PRICE_REGION_CODE, NAME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, ACTIVE, DESCRIPTION, VERSION_INFO, VERSION_NO, REF_ID, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_USER_CODE, MODIFY_USER_CODE, CREATE_ORG_CODE, MODIFY_ORG_CODE, CURRENCY_CODE, TRANSPORT_FLAG,CUSTOMER_NAME,CUSTOMER_CODE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceRegionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceRegionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{active,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{refId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, sysdate, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert /*综合-价格-插入价格方案*/ into PKP.T_SRV_PRICE_PLAN
ID,
T_SRV_PRICE_REGION_ID,
T_SRV_PRICE_REGION_CODE,
NAME,
BEGIN_TIME,
END_TIME,
ACTIVE,
DESCRIPTION,
VERSION_INFO,
VERSION_NO,
REF_ID,
CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME,
CREATE_USER_CODE,
MODIFY_USER_CODE,
CREATE_ORG_CODE,
MODIFY_ORG_CODE,
CURRENCY_CODE,
TRANSPORT_FLAG,
CUSTOMER_NAME,
CUSTOMER_CODE,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{priceRegionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{priceRegionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{active,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{versionInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{refId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysdate, sysdate,
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifyOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{currencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{transportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update /*综合-价格-修改价格方案*/ PKP.T_SRV_PRICE_PLAN
T_SRV_PRICE_REGION_ID = #{priceRegionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T_SRV_PRICE_REGION_CODE = #{priceRegionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=CHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION_INFO = #{versionInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION_NO = #{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REF_ID = #{refId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = sysdate,
CREATE_USER_CODE = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_CODE = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_ORG_CODE = #{createOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_ORG_CODE = #{modifyOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENCY_CODE = #{currencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSPORT_FLAG = #{transportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: pla.ID AS PRICE_PLAN_ID, pro.CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE, pro.NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, goods.CODE AS GOODS_TYPE_CODE, goods.NAME AS GOODS_TYPE_NAME, va.DEPT_REGION_ID AS DEPT_REGION_ID, va.ARRV_REGION_ID AS ARRV_REGION_ID, detail.PRICING_VALUATION_ID AS PRICING_VALUATION_ID, detail.CACULATE_TYPE AS CACULATE_TYPE, detail.LEFTRANGE AS LEFTRANGE, detail.RIGHTRANGE AS RIGHTRANGE, detail.FEE_RATE AS FEE_RATE, detail.MIN_FEE AS MIN_FEE, va.CENTRALIZE_PICKUP, va.FLIGHT_SHIFT, detail.DESCRIPTION as DESCRIPTION, detail.COMB_BILL_TYPE_CODE as COMB_BILL_TYPE_CODE
mapper.select:
select /*整车价格参数方案信息查询*/ p.id, p.scenario_name, p.active, p.begin_time, p.MODIFY_TIME, p.MODIFY_USER, p.end_time, p.version, p.remark from pkp.t_srv_price_car_plan p
AND p.scenario_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{scenarioName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND p.ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (p.BEGIN_TIME <= sysdate and p.END_TIME >= sysdate )
AND (p.BEGIN_TIME > sysdate or p.END_TIME < sysdate )
AND p.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by version ASC

select /*综合-价格-价格方案主信息总记录查询*/ count(*) from PKP.T_SRV_PRICE_CAR_PLAN p
AND p.scenario_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{scenarioName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND p.ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (p.BEGIN_TIME <= sysdate and p.END_TIME >= sysdate )
AND (p.BEGIN_TIME > sysdate or p.END_TIME < sysdate )
mapper.insert: INSERT /*插入整车价格参数方案*/ INTO PKP.T_SRV_PRICE_CAR_PLAN ( id , scenario_name , active , version , create_time , create_user , begin_time , end_time, modify_time , modify_user , remark) values( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scenarioName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT /*插入整车价格参数方案与组织关系*/ INTO PKP.T_SRV_PRICE_CAR_PLAN_ORG ( id , PRICE_CAR_PLAN_ID, organization_id, organization_code , organization_name) values( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carloadPriceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT /*插入整车价格参数方案明细*/ INTO PKP.T_SRV_PRICE_CAR_PLAN_DETAIL ( id , PRICE_CAR_PLAN_ID, active, serial_no , invoice_type , float_up , float_down , remark, other_cost_parameter, package_fee_parameter, weight_parameter, car_cost_parameter, humen_cost_parameter ) values( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carloadPriceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floatUp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{floatDown,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherCostParameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{packageFeeParameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{weightParameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{carCostParameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{humanCostParameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.select: select /*整车价格参数方案信息查询*/ id, scenario_name, active, version, create_time, create_user, begin_time, end_time, modify_time, modify_user, remark from PKP.T_SRV_PRICE_CAR_PLAN where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select /*整车价格参数方案明细查询*/ id , PRICE_CAR_PLAN_ID , active , serial_no , invoice_type , float_up , float_down , remark, other_cost_parameter, package_fee_parameter, weight_parameter, car_cost_parameter, humen_cost_parameter from PKP.T_SRV_PRICE_CAR_PLAN_DETAIL where PRICE_CAR_PLAN_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update /*修改整车价格cans方案*/ PKP.T_SRV_PRICE_CAR_PLAN_DETAIL
float_up = #{floatUp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
float_down = #{floatDown,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
serial_no = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoice_type = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other_cost_parameter = #{otherCostParameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
package_fee_parameter = #{packageFeeParameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
weight_parameter = #{weightParameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
car_cost_parameter = #{carCostParameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
humen_cost_parameter = #{humanCostParameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select /*通过id查询价格参数方案明细查询*/ id , PRICE_CAR_PLAN_ID , active , serial_no , invoice_type , float_up , float_down , remark, other_cost_parameter, package_fee_parameter, weight_parameter, car_cost_parameter, humen_cost_parameter from PKP.T_SRV_PRICE_CAR_PLAN_DETAIL where id = #{planID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select /*查询适合整车价格参数方案的部门*/ o.organization_code, o.organization_name, O.ORGANIZATION_ID from pkp.t_srv_price_car_plan_org o where PRICE_CAR_PLAN_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select /*查询部门是否已经存在激活的整车价格参数方案*/ pla.id, pla.scenario_name from PKP.T_SRV_PRICE_CAR_PLAN pla inner join pkp.t_srv_price_car_plan_org o on o.price_car_plan_id = pla.id where pla.ACTIVE = #{active ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.organization_code = #{organizationCode ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ( ( #{beginTime ,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} >= pla.BEGIN_TIME AND #{beginTime ,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} <= pla.END_TIME ) OR ( #{endTime ,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} >= pla.BEGIN_TIME AND #{endTime ,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} <= pla.END_TIME ) OR ( #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} < pla.begin_time AND #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} > pla.end_time ) )
mapper.update:
update /*激活、中止整车参数方案*/ PKP.T_SRV_PRICE_CAR_PLAN
active = #{active,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scenario_name = #{scenarioName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
begin_Time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_Time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_user = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select /*通过id查询价格参数方案明细查询*/ id , PRICE_CAR_PLAN_ID , active , serial_no , invoice_type , float_up , float_down , remark, other_cost_parameter, package_fee_parameter, weight_parameter, car_cost_parameter, humen_cost_parameter from PKP.T_SRV_PRICE_CAR_PLAN_DETAIL where PRICE_CAR_PLAN_ID = #{carloadPriceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and invoice_type = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: pla.ID AS PRICE_PLAN_ID, pro.CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE, pro.NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, goods.CODE AS GOODS_TYPE_CODE, goods.NAME AS GOODS_TYPE_NAME, va.DEPT_REGION_ID AS DEPT_REGION_ID, va.ARRV_REGION_ID AS ARRV_REGION_ID, va.CENTRALIZE_PICKUP, va.FLIGHT_SHIFT
